backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining Nakshatra calculations, user profile types, logs, birth chart storage, and access‑controlled user data operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, related files, components, and test IDs for recent enhancements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing concise descriptions of frontend components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERIFICATION.md: Checklist for verifying successful production deployment of Version 24.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining light and dark theme design tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React application in dark mode.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, wraps app in ThemeProvider, and initializes Toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/alerts/AlertsTog: Toggle UI for enabling or disabling Nakshatra alert notifications.
frontend/src/components/alerts/Nakshatra: Banner component showing Nakshatra shift alerts with dismiss controls.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper that blocks access and shows a sign‑in prompt when the user is not authenticated.
Modal allowing users to select a city or use geolocation, with search filtering and error handling.
frontend/src/components/errors/Connectio: Displays a connection failure message with retry button and optional error details.
frontend/src/components/errors/UnableToP: Shows an error screen for failed readings with retry option and expandable error details.
frontend/src/components/glyphs/Glyph.tsx: Renders various SVG glyph icons based on a provided type.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top navigation bar with site links, city selector, alerts toggle, and login button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout wrapper providing header, footer, and main content outlet with version info.
frontend/src/components/nakshatra/Naksha: Clickable card linking to a nakshatra detail page, showing name, number, deity, and symbols.
Displays detailed sections of a nakshatra including symbolism, traits, themes, and structured accordion content.
frontend/src/components/nakshatra/Transi: Calculates hours until the next pada and nakshatra transitions using lunar movement and displays formatted times for the user's selected city.
frontend/src/components/today/DailyGuida: Renders accordion-based guidance modules for a given nakshatra using predefined daily content and glyph icons.
frontend/src/components/today/DailyInter: Displays detailed narrative blocks describing the emotional, mental, social, and daily themes for the selected nakshatra.
frontend/src/components/today/DailyLogsP: Provides forms for mood check-ins, energy/restlessness sliders, and sleep/dream logs, saving entries via user log hooks.
frontend/src/components/today/ResonanceS: Compares the current nakshatra with birth chart data and shows whether Moon or Atmakaraka resonance is active today.
frontend/src/data/cities.ts: Exports a list of global cities with names, timezones, coordinates, and optional geolocation flag.
Contains structured daily interpretation data for each nakshatra, including feelings, themes, rituals, and guidance text.
frontend/src/data/nakshatras.ts: Defines interfaces for Nakshatra and Pada and exports a detailed list of nakshatra metadata and traits.
frontend/src/hooks/actorQueryKey.ts: Provides a helper to build stable actor query keys that avoid undefined values.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity changes, refetching dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorInitStatus.ts: Reports the initialization status of the actor query and provides a retry function using a stable query key.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorStable.ts: Creates a stable actor instance with optional access-control initialization and retries, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCitySelection.ts: Manages selected city with validation, localStorage sync, and local time updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context and logic for loading, logging in, and clearing identity using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStorage.ts: Implements a synchronized localStorage hook with same‑tab and cross‑tab state updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useNakshatraAlerts.ts: Tracks nakshatra changes and manages user alert preferences using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useNakshatraNow.ts: Computes current lunar longitude, validates it, and queries the current nakshatra with retry and recompute logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hook that queries backend for Nakshatra determination with validation, diagnostics, and forced refetch support.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserLogs.ts: Hooks to fetch and mutate user logs via the actor, including check-ins, sleep logs, dream logs, and pattern queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks to load and update the caller’s user profile and birth chart using react-query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme variables and typography rules.
frontend/src/lib/appVersion.ts: Exports the current app version string.
frontend/src/lib/astro/lunarLongitude.ts: Provides a simplified lunar longitude calculation based on days since J2000.
frontend/src/lib/diagnostics/nakshatraDi: Diagnostics utilities for Nakshatra queries, including logging, longitude validation, and normalization.
frontend/src/lib/diagnostics/sanitizeErr: Utility to convert unknown error values into safe display strings.
frontend/src/lib/insights/dreamThemeExtr: Extracts keyword themes from dream logs grouped by Nakshatra, filtering stopwords and limiting keywords.
frontend/src/lib/insights/nakshatraInsig: Generates up to three insights from check-in, sleep, and dream logs based on repeated Nakshatra patterns.
frontend/src/lib/nakshatra/index.ts: Helpers for looking up nakshatras and generating URL slugs from their names.
frontend/src/lib/time/timezone.ts: Timezone utilities to format dates and compute local-time Date objects for lunar calculations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryInsightsPage.t: Displays user log–based insights, history, and dream themes with authentication and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgeBasePage.tsx: Provides a searchable list of all nakshatras using a simple text filter.
frontend/src/pages/NakshatraDetailPage.t: Shows detailed information for a specific nakshatra with navigation and sections.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSettingsPage.t: Allows authenticated users to edit profile info and birth chart data, with save operations and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/TodayPage.tsx: Fetches and displays today’s nakshatra data, handling geolocation, backend readiness, errors, and premium modules.
frontend/src/pages/TomorrowPage.tsx: Computes and displays tomorrow’s nakshatra using projected lunar longitude, with error and loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/VisualStyleSystemPage: Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routes), storing them in sessionStorage, and retrieving or clearing persisted values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines the Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and extended theme values.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, including requirements to fix profile save failures and add Lahiri-based Nakshatra calculations with persistence.
